Join us Phantom QA/QC open panel discussion on July 27th 4-6pm EST

This meeting will happen on July 27th 4-6pm EST.

The agenda and notes for the meeting will be collected here.

See you all there! Bring your friends.

Check and subscribe to the niQC calendar for more details on this event and to stay tuned for all our events.
